author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...LORENA A LITTLE STRONGER BUT EXPECTED TO WEAKEN QUICKLY ON THURSDAY AND FRIDAY... ...RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING CONTINUES FOR BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR AND SOUTHWESTERN SONORA...
summary: ...LORENA A LITTLE STRONGER BUT EXPECTED TO WEAKEN QUICKLY ON THURSDAY AND FRIDAY... ...RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING CONTINUES FOR BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR AND SOUTHWESTERN SONORA... As of 8:00 PM MST Wed Sep 03 the center of Lorena was located near 23.4, -113.2 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 981 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...LORENA A LITTLE STRONGER BUT EXPECTED TO WEAKEN QUICKLY ON THURSDAY AND FRIDAY... ...RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING CONTINUES FOR BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR AND SOUTHWESTERN SONORA... As of 8:00 PM MST Wed Sep 03 the center of Lorena was located near 23.4, -113.2 with movement NW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 981 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Lorena (EP2/EP122025)
